attributes.action: Get doctors back in the surgery
attributes.additional_details: Dentist, Opticians, Nurse practitioner's and Audiologists all have face to face consultations. Why are doctors not , they may as well work in a call centre
attributes.background:
Dentist, Opticians, Nurse practitioner's and Audiologists all have face to face consultations.Why are doctors not doing them , they may as well work in a call centre  
My wife ended up in A&E due to only having a telephone consultation with her GP . She has COPD and A&E weren't happy .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action:

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
